ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( CONTAINS(Name, "ESTGB") || CONTAINS(Name, "ESTFR") || CONTAINS(Name, "ESTBE") || CONTAINS(Name, "ESTNL") || CONTAINS(Name, "ESPBE") || CONTAINS(Name, "ESPGB") || CONTAINS(Name, "ESPFR") || CONTAINS(Name, "ESPNL") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incorrect format for Insurance Reference. The reference must start with either: "ESTGB" "ESTFR" "ESTBE" "ESTNL" "ESPBE" "ESPGB" "ESPFR" "ESPNL"
